data.title: Benjamin Chapman 4-year Corn Whiskey / 750mL
data.meta_description:
ABV: 45%
Their Story: Benjamin Chapman's 4-Year Corn Whiskey is a tribute to the legendary distiller who pioneered the craft of corn whiskey in the early 1800s. He was known for his adventurous spirit and his passion for quality. He used only the finest ingredients and the most innovative techniques to create a whiskey that was unmatched in flavor and character. Today, we honor his legacy by following his original recipe and using his signature copper pot stills. The whiskey is distilled from a mash of 80% Corn, 11% Rye, and 9% Malt. Sourced and produced in the United States, the water source for distillation is Kentucky Limestone Water which imparts important minerals and acts as a unique filter for the base liquid. The primary distillation takes place in a column still with the subsequent distillation in a continuous pot still that acts as a doubler to extract flavors. This give the spirit a pale golden hue in the glass that comes alive with aromas of cornbread and vanilla. On the initial approach, you'll
